about_the_game:
The Season 7: Compete & Conquer DLC is included in the Year 2 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Race in exciting trials with Season 7: Compete & Conquer. This season introduces two brand new vehicles and a map set in Tennessee, USA, bringing a whole new playground packed with activities. Challenge your friends in intense racing challenges, or go alone in time-trial events!

The Season 7: Compete & Conquer DLC includes:
• A new race-focused map, in Tennessee, USA, featuring a dirt circuit and off-road course. Drive on-circuit and off-road in time trial challenges, or compete directly with a friend in checkpoint-style races.
• Two new vehicles, including the Gor BY-4 light scout car, and the Azov 43-191 “Sprinter” truck - with custom-made racing liveries!
detailed_description:
The Season 7: Compete & Conquer DLC is included in the Year 2 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Race in exciting trials with Season 7: Compete & Conquer. This season introduces two brand new vehicles and a map set in Tennessee, USA, bringing a whole new playground packed with activities. Challenge your friends in intense racing challenges, or go alone in time-trial events!

The Season 7: Compete & Conquer DLC includes:
• A new race-focused map, in Tennessee, USA, featuring a dirt circuit and off-road course. Drive on-circuit and off-road in time trial challenges, or compete directly with a friend in checkpoint-style races.
• Two new vehicles, including the Gor BY-4 light scout car, and the Azov 43-191 “Sprinter” truck - with custom-made racing liveries!

name: SnowRunner - Season 7: Compete & Conquer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: This product is included in the Year 2 Pass for SnowRunner. Experience the thrill of racing with Season 7: Compete & Conquer. Take the wheel of two new vehicles in Tennessee, USA, and compete in exciting trials and races!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
